Config Management Camp

5 - 7 February, 2018

Gent, Belgium

Auditing AWS Serverlessly

Thomas Krag

With automation in place we can now allow more and more people to build infrastructure in AWS. However, how do you ensure that everyone is following the best practices without having to look for obscure and outdated documentation or insane micro management? With a few Lambda functions you'll be able to automate the micro management and you can trust that everyone who is onboarded will be able to create new infrastructure worry-free. I'll be showing you: a) How to get started with Cloud Custodian, b) How you define and deploy the rules you'd like to enforce, and c) how you remove the fear of failure by letting Lambda correct their mistakes.

About Speaker

Thomas Krag is co-founder of Method, which is a consultancy company specializing in DevOps (culture), Systems Engineering, etc. He is also one of the main organizers of devopsdays Amsterdam and devops Amsterdam meet ups.In his free time he likes drinking whisky and/or beer, but only because he enjoys it - not due to on-call.
